Other Information.Test Conditions: Complex biological samples (human plasma, urine), MALDI-TOF-MS analysis
Other Information.Additional Info: Favourable enrichment of larger molecular weight peptides (approx. 8000 Da).

Other Information.Test Conditions: Complex biological samples (human plasma, urine), MALDI-TOF-MS analysis
Other Information.Additional Info: Effective exclusion of proteins in the 10-90 kDa range.

Sieving Mechanism: Molecular sieving effect for selective inclusion of peptides and exclusion of proteins based on pore apertures.

Experimental Validation.Method: MALDI-TOF-MS analysis, X-ray diffraction, N2 adsorption experiment
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Enhancement factor (EF) of 19 for S/N ratio for peptides; clean baseline in the molecular weight range 10–90 kDa for proteins. High efficiency and size-selective adsorption.

Other Information.Additional Info: Used as an adsorbent for enrichment of peptides and exclusion of proteins from complex biological samples. Shows good reproducibility and stability.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Complex biological samples (human plasma, urine), MALDI-TOF-MS analysis
Other Information.Additional Info: Efficient enrichment of lower molecular weight peptides (approx. 4200 Da).

Other Information.Test Conditions: Complex biological samples (human plasma, urine), MALDI-TOF-MS analysis
Other Information.Additional Info: Effective exclusion of proteins in the 10-90 kDa range.

Sieving Mechanism: Molecular sieving effect for selective inclusion of peptides and exclusion of proteins based on pore apertures.

Experimental Validation.Method: MALDI-TOF-MS analysis, X-ray diffraction, N2 adsorption experiment
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Enhancement factor (EF) of 64 for S/N ratio for peptides; clean baseline in the molecular weight range 10–90 kDa for proteins. High efficiency and size-selective adsorption.

Other Information.Additional Info: Used as an adsorbent for enrichment of peptides and exclusion of proteins from complex biological samples. Shows good reproducibility and stability. Has similar composition and topology to MIL-101.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Complex biological samples (human plasma, urine), MALDI-TOF-MS analysis
Other Information.Additional Info: Efficient enrichment of peptides with a wide range of molecular weights.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Molecular sieving effect, complemented by a water-washing step for flushing out surface-adsorbed proteins.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Complex biological samples (human plasma, urine), MALDI-TOF-MS analysis
Other Information.Additional Info: Successful exclusion of all proteins larger than 10 kDa, including human serum albumin (HSA; 67 kDa, 5 x 7 x 7 nm).

Sieving Mechanism: Molecular sieving effect for selective inclusion of peptides and exclusion of proteins based on pore apertures, with additional aid from water-washing step to remove surface-adsorbed proteins.

Experimental Validation.Method: MALDI-TOF-MS analysis, X-ray diffraction, N2 adsorption experiment
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Enhancement factor (EF) of 98 for S/N ratio for peptides; all protein peaks disappeared (clean background) in the 10–90 kDa range. High efficiency and size-selective adsorption.

Other Information.Additional Info: Used as an adsorbent for enrichment of peptides and exclusion of proteins from complex biological samples. Shows good reproducibility and stability. Has similar composition and topology to MIL-100.
